title: Ichigo Mashimaro Encore (Strawberry Marshmallow Encore)
synopsis: Ichigo Mashimaro encore is a two-episode OVA continues onwards from the previous set of OVAs of Ichigo Mashimaro.
voices: ['Orikasa, Fumiko', 'Nabatame, Hitomi', 'Chiba, Saeko', 'Kawasumi, Ayako', 'Noto, Mamiko', 'Minagawa, Junko']
